description:
Historic high ceiling Apt in an elevator building.  Perfect for couples, friends or business travelers.

The living room features tall south facing windows with authentic period shutters & open view and a decorative fireplace. 

The bedroom is equipped with a queen size bed and offers closet & drawer space. 

The kitchen has a breakfast bar and you're welcome to what we have in stock.

Blocks from the Brooklyn Heights Promenade and 2/3/4/5/A/C/R/F.  Stroll to ferries, DUMBO, & Smith St.

You're welcome to utilize the entire apartment.  Please be respectful of personal drawers/corner of the closet/shelves.

Please call or text us if you have any questions.

Our neighbors are civil and mature and the building tends to be muted.  Please be respectful and considerate.  

Late checkout is generally possible.  Just ask.  

Please note that bathroom is small and there is no bathtub - standing shower only.
name: Inviting Pre-War 1 Bedroom - Brooklyn Heights, NY
review: Great location and flexible check in and check out times.
